alert.note: Alert for Adams; Arapahoe (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 1:58PM MDT until July 20 at 2:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Arapahoe County in northeastern Colorado... South central Adams County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 230 PM MDT. * At 157 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles east of Arapahoe Park, or 21 miles east of Denver, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Hail may accumulate on roadways causing hazardous travel. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Watkins around 210 PM MDT. Manila Village around 215 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Bennett and Strasburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
